title.text: OLACMS: Comparisons and Applications in Chinese and Formosan Languages

abstractContent.text: OLACMS (stands for Open Language Archives Community Metadata Set) is a standard for describe language resources.

entities.text: Open Language Archives Community Metadata Set)

abstractContent.text: This paper provides suggestion to OLACMS 0.4 version by comparing it with other standards and applying it to Chinese and Formosan languages.
